metadata.title: Lumo - Simple Rent Tracking
metadata.description: Lumo gives independent landlords clear answers about rent payments. Track rooms and rent status without spreadsheets or stress.
metadata.keywords: rent tracking, landlord app, property management, independent landlord, rent reminder

hero.headline: Rent tracking, made simple
hero.subtext:
Lumo gives you clear answers about rent payments. No spreadsheets, no stress.
Track rooms and payment status in one calm place.

features.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't
features.subtitle: Tools designed for tracking your rent

items.title: Track rooms & rent status
items.description: See all your rooms and their payment status at a glance

items.title: See payment status clearly
items.description: Know instantly who has paid and who hasn't. No digging through files

items.title: Built for you, not companies
items.description: Designed for independent property owners who track rent personally

items.title: Forgetting rent dates
items.description: Missing payments because there's no easy way to track who paid and when

items.title: Messy spreadsheets
items.description: Excel files that grow confusing over time, with formulas breaking unexpectedly

items.title: Paper notes everywhere
items.description: Scattered notebooks and sticky notes that are easy to lose or misplace

solution.title: There's a clearer way
solution.description: Lumo is purpose-built for independent property owners. It's calm, simple, and helps you know where things stand without the complexity
